title: Now, Hips
lyrics: Tone ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it aprokgang kkeutbuteo jejukkaji mareugo talheul ttaekkaji cheoeumen meorireul jwauro majimage neun jogeumeun bukkeureowodo ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it myeoneu ri halmeoni halmeoniui eonni jae miissneun geim hanbeon hae bojyo gyuchigeun eoreum hamyeon meomchugo ja eoreum ja ttaeng ja eoreum ja ttaeng meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it 2002nyeon yeoreume urineun da daehanminguk 2003nyeon yeoreume urineun da eongdeongireul chumeul chuja uri da noraehaja ja namjjok jeju geurigo gwangju jeojjoge busan ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu ha hey won tu won tu son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it son meori wiro jwauro heundeul geurigo yeopeuro shake it shake it meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it meorie neun darie neun ja eongdeon gi ireohge shake it shake it
